name: Spiky David
description:
Immediate notes:
This game will be updated, there is no music yet, and more codes and references will be added
The timer is supposed to stay at 00:00
If you get stuck in the Shoot Em Up Minigame, Press Start/Enter

I wonder if this is the first original Spiky Harold fan game?
Right so, Spiky Harold is a game that released on the ZX Spectrum, Developed in Britain, About a Hedgehog who needs to get food to hibernate. This fan game follows that game...
David couldn't hibernate because Harold took all of the food... He now needs to explore the unknown to get more food!
Find all of the food and return to his House!
The Wine makes David Hiccup, don't drink too much!

This Game will be in Parts, This is the first part... More coming in the future...
Gimmick Suggestions Open for That!

Bugs:
You may bounce when falling into pit sometimes

Controls:
X - Jump
Z - Advance Text
Enter - Start
Arrows - Move/Select

Thanks for Playing!
